addActionListener(ActionListener) - Method in class fr.emn.easymol.geometry.Atom2D
Adds the specified action listener to receive action events from this Atom2D.
addAtom(int) - Method in class fr.emn.easymol.core.Molecule
Adds an atom to this molecule (does not add any link to other atoms).
The integer in parameter must be a valid atom type (a constant in the class Atom, like Atom.H).
The integer returned is used to manipulate this particular atom in the molecule.
addAtom(int) - Method in class fr.emn.easymol.gui.LewisViewWindow
Adds an atom to the window
addAtom(int, int) - Method in class fr.emn.easymol.core.Molecule

Adds a link for this molecule and sets the link type to single
addLink(int, int, int) - Method in class fr.emn.easymol.core.Molecule
Adds a link for this molecule.
addLink(MoleculeNode) - Method in class fr.emn.easymol.core.MoleculeNode
Adds a new link to this Molecule Node.

Angle3D - class fr.emn.easymol.geometry.Angle3D.
A simple class to manipulate angles for 3D transforms

This class converts a vector composed of angles in degrees into radians.

Builds a new Angle3D
Atom - class fr.emn.easymol.core.Atom.
The class for Atom Modelization in the EasyMol software

This class provides a simple API to manipulate Atom objects.

GUIConstants - interface fr.emn.easymol.gui.GUIConstants.
The interface to store all the constants used in EasyMol.

It holds screen settings, dimensions of windows, paths and name of icons files, title of windows and menu labels, tooltips for the buttons, name of the actions, error messages and the the GPL disclaimer.

L

LewisViewWindow - class fr.emn.easymol.gui.LewisViewWindow.
The Lewis View of a Molecule.

This component is a JPanel containing Atom2D components (the atoms of the molecule) and a list of all the links of the molecule.
LewisViewWindow(Molecule, int) - Constructor for class fr.emn.easymol.gui.LewisViewWindow
Builds a new Lewis View Window
LibGUI - class fr.emn.easymol.gui.LibGUI.
The class to store all the methods used by the GUI to perform file operations.

It is used as a library.

Builds a new Link2D
linkType(int) - Method in class fr.emn.easymol.core.MoleculeNode
Returns the type of the link (single or double or more) for the node at position i in the list of links
linkView() - Method in class fr.emn.easymol.core.MoleculeNode
Returns a linear string representation of the links tree (the whole molecule) The represenattion will be displayed as (for CO2) C=O=O

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class fr.emn.easymol.main.EasyMol
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class fr.emn.easymol.main.EasyRun
 
Molecule - class fr.emn.easymol.core.Molecule.
The class to manipulate Molecules in EasyMol

This class is the core class of the EasyMol software.
Molecule() - Constructor for class fr.emn.easymol.core.Molecule
Builds a new molecule with no name
Molecule(String) - Constructor for class fr.emn.easymol.core.Molecule
Builds a new molecule and sets its name
Molecule3D - class fr.emn.easymol.geometry.Molecule3D.
The class to create a Molecule 3D geometry.

This class converts a Molecule object into a Java3D BranchGroup object which is in fact the Molecule geometry.
Molecule3D(Molecule, int) - Constructor for class fr.emn.easymol.geometry.Molecule3D
Builds a new 3D Geometry for a Molecule
MoleculeNode - class fr.emn.easymol.core.MoleculeNode.
The class for Molecule link modelization in the EasyMol software.

This class implements a data structure to create and manipulate links between different atoms (in a molecule for example).
MoleculeNode(int) - Constructor for class fr.emn.easymol.core.MoleculeNode
Builds a new Molecule Node and uses scientific data to set the valence
MoleculeNode(int, int) - Constructor for class fr.emn.easymol.core.MoleculeNode
Builds a new Molecule Node and sets its type and valence
MoleculeXMLReader - class fr.emn.easymol.xml.MoleculeXMLReader.
A class to read a molecule description from a XML file.

The MoleculeXMLReader class is used to load a molecule described in a file.
MoleculeXMLReader(String) - Constructor for class fr.emn.easymol.xml.MoleculeXMLReader
Builds a new MoleculeXMLReader
MoleculeXMLWriter - class fr.emn.easymol.xml.MoleculeXMLWriter.
A class to write a Molecule to disk using the EasyMol XML format

This class just saves the molecule object passed to its constructor with the method writeMolecule.
MoleculeXMLWriter(Molecule, int, String) - Constructor for class fr.emn.easymol.xml.MoleculeXMLWriter
Builds a new MoleculeXMLWriter

NavigationWindow - class fr.emn.easymol.gui.NavigationWindow.
The class to display the 3D view for a molecule and navigate into this 3D view.

As it uses Molecule3D to render the molecule, the root atom passed to this class must * NEVER be an hydrogen (see Molecule3D for more details, this class is used quite the same way).

Creates a new empty NavigationWindow

Creates a new 3D Navigation Window
